original: Larsson, Lars Sigvard, civilingenjör, Trollhättan, f. 23/9/08 i Gärdserum, Kalm. ,1., av Karl Gabinus L. o. Hildur Margareta Nilsson. G. 40 m. Karin Jagardt. Barn: Ulf f. 41, Mats 44. — Utex. fr. Örebro tekn. gymn. 28, fr. KTH (M) 34. Chef f. kontr:avd. v. A-B Sv. Järnv :verkstäd. aeroplanavd. i Linköp. 35-37, chef f. serietillverkn :-kontr. v. Sv. Aeroplan A-B där 39-47, chef f. kontr :avd. v. Sv. Aeroplan A-B i Trollhättan sed. 47. Stud:resa t. USA 38.
translated:
Larsson, Lars Sigvard, Civil Engineer, Trollhättan, b. 23/9/08 in Gärdserum, Kalmar, first child of Karl Gabinus L. and Hildur Margareta Nilsson. Married in 1940 to Karin Jagardt. Children: Ulf b. 1941, Mats b. 1944. 

Education: Graduated from Örebro Technical Gymnasium in 1928, and from the Royal Institute of Technology (Mechanical Engineering) in 1934. 

Career: Head of contracting department at A-B Swedish Iron Workshops' airplane division in Linköping from 1935-1937. Head of series production contracting at Swedish Airplanes A-B from 1939-1947. Head of contracting department at Swedish Airplanes A-B in Trollhättan since 1947. Went on a study trip to the USA in 1938.

organization.name: A-B Swedish Iron Workshops' Airplane Division
